mapper.update:
update report_owe_fee t
t.config_name= #{configName},
t.deadline_time= #{deadlineTime},
t.owner_tel= #{ownerTel},
t.update_time= #{updateTime},
t.owner_id= #{ownerId},
t.fee_id= #{feeId},
t.amount_owed= #{amountOwed},
t.payer_obj_name= #{payerObjName},
t.owner_name= #{ownerName},
t.config_id= #{configId},
t.fee_name= #{feeName},
t.end_time= #{endTime},
t.community_id= #{communityId},
t.payer_obj_type= #{payerObjType},
t.payer_obj_id= #{payerObjId}
where 1=1 and t.owe_id= #{oweId}
and t.community_id= #{communityId}
mapper.select: select t.fee_id feeId from pay_fee t inner join pay_fee_config pfc on t.config_id = pfc.config_id inner join report_owe_fee rof on t.fee_id = rof.fee_id where (t.status_cd = '1' or pfc.status_cd = '1') and t.community_id= #{communityId}
